duties.description: Support Wealth Management products for global markets
Work as scrum master for agile team daily development(Jira, Scrum methodology, 2-weeks Spring)
Use React/Redux, in-house UI library to build up modern UI to help simplify customer-facing processes for banking
Dealing with complex forms and validation rules, handling async API calls, and writing unit tests & end to end tests on a daily basis.
Built 20+ fully-functional real-world projects, including social media, online games, and personal portfolio sites.
Spent 12 months successfully pair-programming with developers worldwide with best practices, agile methodologies, and industry-standard git flows.
Mastered algorithms and data structures by completing 300+ hours of coding challenges.
Provided mentorship, assistance, and code reviews to junior developers.
Troubleshot and wrote code for the backend(Java/SQL), provide stable and optimized restful API service.
Wrote system scripts for seamlessly data migration (Table convert/field recalculate/DB transfor) to ensure app upgrade with zero downtime and less user interference.
